Headline: #15 Jeffery Local |Temporary Reroute at 71st /Jefffrey
ShortDescription: 15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Stony Island, 73rd and Jeffrey due to street blockage near 71st /Jefffrey.

How does this affect my trip?
